channel.title: Runescape Private Server & Webhosting Solutions
channel.description:
Well, primarily, my webhosting website, serves shared hosting plans, reseller plans, gameservers, shoutcast, teamspeak, and dedicated servers.
My website URL is: [url=http://xtendhosting.co.uk/]http://xtendhosting.co.uk/[/url]
I have had great interest for far and its going really well, i actually host our good friend here Pwnd, so you can ask him if its ant good :)
the webhosting server is in a red hat linux, i686 evironment.. (centos 5 x64 to be presise)
the gameservers run on windows server 2003, all our servers are UK based with direct, 100mbps, tier1 connections.
Amongst other things, people have been asking me about hosting their runescape private servers on my gameservers. I have decided that this could be a good idea, and am currently offering this service at £6 monthly... it includes FTP access to your dir, unlimited bandwidth, and a web based control panel to start / stop your server (still in development)
if you are interested, feel free to contact me via msn: (drewley@hotmail.co.uk)
thanks all!

item.title: Runescape Private Server & Webhosting Solutions
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:15, topic:124231”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=174087.msg1605943#msg1605943 date=1184724393]
Advice on the prices,

Alot of Americans don’t know how much 12 Euros cost in USD
[/quote]

A lot of English people don’t know what shit cost’s when it’s in USD, but we’re not n00bs and search google for “currency converters”. PS, it’s GBP, Great British Pounds.[/quote]

Well said

And i have my first private server hosting customer

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Private Server & Webhosting Solutions
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:8, topic:124231”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=174087.msg1605779#msg1605779 date=1184721456]
can you get me free hosting

Anyhow if you could could you possibly host call of duty UO servers :D?
[/quote]

Ask Pwnd, he does free-hosting.[/quote]
pwnd is hosted on my server. and he has his own hosting company, i very much doubt he does freebies either.

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:124293”]way too expensive
even kib has lower prices.[/quote]

I do not oversell my services, therefore if you pay for 100gb bandwidth you GET 100gb bandwidth, hosts that offer ‘unlimited’ diskspace and bandwidth are liars and can never live up to that expectation.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Private Server & Webhosting Solutions
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:8, topic:124231”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=174087.msg1605779#msg1605779 date=1184721456]
can you get me free hosting

Anyhow if you could could you possibly host call of duty UO servers :D?
[/quote]

Ask Pwnd, he does free-hosting.[/quote]

Game-server hosting

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:124327”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=174087.msg1606244#msg1606244 date=1184728874]

Sorry, i cant do freebies =/
my prices are cheap enough

and im not 100% sure what call of duty UO is, you’d have to contact me on that one, but the chances are, it will be possible.

Not even me :D?

anyhow Call of duty Uo = United offensive.

its the expansionpack for call of duty 1… but there are still many people who play
[/quote]
Damn i wanted that game!!
I cant get it because the “Place” were i live in “We” dont have it…ffs…[/quote]
Download the torrent…

Read full topic
